name: washingSpinDry_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off the spin dry function of a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the spin dry function.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to turn off the spin dry function.
